Reviews.Title: “Great Girls Golf Getaway”
Reviews.Author: candallah
Reviews.Content: The Lodge type accommodations, the friendly people and the golf made this 'girls golf getaway' wonderful. You never felt like you were in Orlando/near Disney, but it was there if you wanted to visit. The lodge was quiet, there was a small gym and lots to do in the area. Tons of restaurants and other golf courses made the trip to Orlando anything but a kids vacation. I would reccomend this property to anyone looking for a get away to a lovely resort without the large resort features of chain hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Bit Disappointed in the Villas”
Reviews.Author: Hal-ThePlanner
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the 2 bedroom villas. The kitchens had been upgraded, but the rest of the homes were very outdated. They were clean, but I would have expected more than something that looked like it was still in the 80's. My recommendation is to stay in the lodge itself vs. the villas.

Reviews.Title: “Female liked Arnie's place”
Reviews.Author: Mary K Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Excellent stay. Quiet with beautiful views of the fairways. Staff was very helpful and friendly. I was a solo, female, traveler who felt quite at home there. All the bathroom lotions, etc. smelled like men's aftershave. Not exactly what a woman wants. But they were plentiful. I'd definitely return. Oh, and the pictures of Arnie gracing the walls are a nice touch, if not overwhelming at times. ;)

Reviews.Title: “Memorable experience welll worth it”
Reviews.Author: Mike2bike4
Reviews.Content: My buddy and I stayed in one of the cottages which was close to the main lodge. It was very well appointed with two separate bedrooms, no snoring issues The course was in great condition as they were prepping for the AP invitational. The forecaddie was good company and the speed of play very good. All the staff we spoke to were very friendly. All in all this was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Beware the maintenance staff”
Reviews.Author: Doug L
Reviews.Content: Overall we had a nice stay and Mr. Palmer is very gracious. The unfortunate part was quite disturbing - the head of maintenance walked into our room unannounced and with no knock and said he was told that our room "might" be unoccupied. Maybe it's best to keep your clothes on and the door lock on. GM never responded to my complaint, so I assume he doesn't care.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: raincheck10
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night to have access to play the world famous course. Staff was freindly, room was updated and very nice, pool was warm on a cool December day and the golf incredable. Enjoyed a breakfast and a lunch in the country club like atmosphere which was resonable in price and very tasty.Yes I did see the man himself and got a very memorable photo with him.

Reviews.Title: “Nice surprise”
Reviews.Author: NewJerseyKeengolfer
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Bayhill Lodge and just loved it. The pool and spa were lovely. We did aqua aerobics aswell which was a lot of fun. The food was great and they prepared it exactly the way we wanted it. It was also v reasonably priced so we ate most of our meals there. The golf course was fabulous and the views from our room across the range and putting greens was a real treat. We saw the great Arnold Palmer practice on the range which was amazing to see and met him at our meals. It was a wonderful trip and close to Disney aswell. V nice and peaceful for Couples and mad keen Golfers. Staff were incredible and its obvious to see, they love working there. Will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Bay hill must visit for any golfer”
Reviews.Author: Ballymacscanlon
Reviews.Content: last stop off on Holiday break after disney - bit of my time! Staff make you feel like a long term member, not to stuffy except have to wear collar shirt for breakfast not a big hardship, breakfast was superb and such good value. Golf was on expensive side but it is bayhill - right? Arnold not about, comes back after Nov according to staff and likes nothing better to speak to as many as possible, I'm even more of a fan now knowing how much he's loved by all the staff. I'd go back in a heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Small hotel, clean, good sized room”
Reviews.Author: katensteve
Reviews.Content: Was here on business for a very short stay. Comfortable, quiet hotel - on the small side (i.e. no sundries store, just a pro store) and you have to pay using your hotel card (no cash accepted.) Room as a great size, very comfortable and the bathroom was surprisingly very large. Pleasant front desk staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: NewfiePrincess
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Bay Hill for one night while visiting the Orlando area in September. Arrived super early at 8:00am and was able to check in right away. The loby is very elegantly decorated and inviting. Staff extremely helpful. Our room was very nice. Spacious and very clean. Bathroom was quite large and bright. Opened our curtains to an amazing view of the practice green, driving range, and one of the holes. We ate at one of the restaurants there (sorry I forget the name). It was a later meal, so not many people around. Food was delicious!! Huge servings for what you pay. We had nachos, wings, and "their" fries! The grounds are beautiful. We walked around, so peaceful and quiet. Golfed the next morning and had an enjoyable round. It was a great experience to stay here and would recommend it to any avid golfers!!

Reviews.Title: “golf and lodging at its best”
Reviews.Author: gammo
Reviews.Content: Have been at least seven times to Bay Hill and it is quite simply the best "stay and play" golf venue in Orlando. From the tastefully appointed rooms (I was once given the late Mrs. Winnie Palmer's suite) to the superb grillroom everything at Bay Hill is understated and classy! The only overstated element is the amount of portraiture of ARNIE on the walls! The American breakfast is outstanding as are all the entrees in the restaurant. The inclusion of a high Service charge on food and beverage tabs is a minor irritant. Then there is the golf course...which is the main reason to live at Bay Hill...its simply my all-time Orlando favourite!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoFamily2010
Reviews.Content: We stayed on a family vacation for a few nights. Enjoyed the pool and great location.

Reviews.Title: “More Than We Expected”
Reviews.Author: majackson34
Reviews.Content: The staff at Bay Hill are very warm and friendly. My family and I (BF and 2 teenage sons) stayed 4 days/3 nights in one of the guest houses and were absolutely blown away with it. The fully equipped kitchen was to die for with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and every utensil you thought you would need. It was like a home away from home. The lake in the back of the house, sand on the shoreline, screened wrap-around porch, well manicured lawn, hardwood floors, housekeeping...I literally could go on and on...Wonderful stay...Fun times!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: RockyRaleighNC
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night at Bay Hill so we could play the golf course. The golf course is beyond fantastic and when we played we were at times the only people I could see. The lodge and clubhouse is pure 70's high end golf. Walking through the place is like a time capsule. We stayed in one of the villas which is actually a small two bedroom house that has been refurbished. It still smelled a bit like Grandma's but was very nicely done and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend it for a night or two and would highly recommend the course.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Bogiejoe
Reviews.Content: From arrival to departure, every last member of staff displayed both a welcoming and helpful attitude. Rooms were clean and comfortable, food was outstanding, and golf course was immaculately groomed. Prices may not be the lowest you might find but Arnold does deliver value and absolute enjoyment. Took my wife there for a birthday celebration and she made me promise to do it again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Country Club perks without the membership dues!”
Reviews.Author: dhkmo
Reviews.Content: We spent Christmas Eve here and it was perfect! The staff is some of the freindliest I have ever encountered! Championship golf course, clean, understated rooms. All this hidden in a residentail area makes you feel you are at a country club. Highly recomend this hotel for it's unassuming qualities and top of the line golf course with a staff that is amazing!

Reviews.Title: “If you love golf, stay here”
Reviews.Author: JayHTexas
Reviews.Content: Stayed here because my coworker is a golf nut and wanted to play Bay Hill. Seems as if you are staying at a country club instead of a hotel. Everything was very nice, service good. The lodge itself is a tad bit outdated, with low ceilings, but very clean and nice

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: roadwarrrior2
Reviews.Content: Spent (3) nights at the lodge for golf. Great food, great staff, golf course was excellent. Had the opportunity to meet Mr. Arnold Palmer at lunch. Very quite location, many good restaurants nearby. Can't wait to return next year!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant golf hotel, service should be better”
Reviews.Author: SummerKesa
Reviews.Content: We stayed few nights in this hotel. It is located in a suburban area further away from services and parks, next to golf fields. Room was big, but there was no minibar where to keep refreshments cool. The service at the reception was rather impolite and bothered especially during evening and nights. Good hotel for golfers, but I preferred by far this other hotel which we stayed in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Upscale Country Club Experience”
Reviews.Author: Petterie
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for four nights for business as customer booked me here. Really didn't understand the reason for this, but experience was, at least, interesting. This place is "normal" Golf / Country Club with all those needed amenities (Golf, Bar, Clubs, Pools, Spa, Tennis). It is clean, friendly, but a bit odd place for my kind of visit, as I was not using any of their services. Also they have upscale country club dress code, which I didn't know before. No problems of course, but could have been nice to know beforehand. So - no jeans, but slacks with collar shirts. I of course had my jeans and bahamas t-shirt =) If you are for those activities, this is excellent place. If not, this is nice place.

HotelInfo.Name: Arnold Palmer's Bay Hill Lodge
HotelInfo.Address: 9000 Bay Hill Blvd., Orlando, FL 32819
